priorityRules: If health is low, consume food and move to safety.
If animals are nearby, equip weapon and attack.
If carrying raw food, smelt it into cooked food.
If messages request food, prioritize delivering to the requester.
If surplus food in inventory, create trade proposals.
If no animals nearby, explore open areas and plains.
cooperationRules: Provide food when requested by any agent.
Broadcast animal herd locations when found.
Trade cooked food for tools and ores.
hostilityRules: Defend hunting grounds from agents who scare away animals.
notes: Hunt for food and stay mobile. Trade food for equipment.
